title: Heart of Silicon Valley - Close to everywhere - Great Schools
posting_body: Great Sunnyvale Schools - Heart of Silicon Valley - Close to Caltrain and downtown Sunnyvale - Very calm/quiet Street.
Single Story House with 4 bedrooms with 3 bathrooms 2200 sq ft.  Central Heating and Cooling (AC)
Cumberland Elementary - Sunnyvale Middle School - Homestead High School.
Short counter commute to Santa Clara, San Jose, Fremont - 8 miles to Palo Alto and much closer to Mountain View.
Walking distance to Caltrain Station, library, downtown Sunnyvale w/ Sunnyvale Farmers Market each Saturday and with great restaurants.
Very close to Washington park - tennis - soccer - picnic - play ground - swimming.
If you like hiking close to Rancho San Antonio Open Space.
Dining room and family room viewable/accessible from kitchen.
Lovely wood floor in living room, hallway, and bedrooms - as well as beautiful laminate floors in family room and kitchen.
Tile floors in sunroom and bathrooms.
Sunroom in the back - all windows - great for winter morning coffee and summer evening dining.
All bathrooms remodeled - new tile, etc.
No Smoking - Up to 2 cats allowed - no dogs.
